sentence.text: Mutations in the mitochondrial alanyl-transfer (t)RNA synthetase 2 (mitochondrial respiratory chain complex assembly; OMIM 612035) have been linked to leukoencephalopathy recently.

We report a case with novel mitochondrial respiratory chain complex assembly gene mutations with developed striking cerebellar atrophy and leukoencephalopathy, which helps to further understand the clinical and genetic heterogeneity of AARS2-L
